name: Raavas Ethereal Sanctuary
description: A domain of gentle radiance where the line between physical and spirit realms fades. Raava's luminescence weaves through the air, offering peace.

messages.enter: Soft pulses of light wash over you, erasing worry and guiding you deeper into serene understanding.
messages.look: Here, color and form blend seamlessly, each breath a reminder of unity between worlds.
